description:
CloudBerry Explorer for Amazon S3 is a freeware Amazon S3 and Amazon Glacier client designed to run in Windows environment.

S3 Explorer provides a user interface to Amazon S3 accounts, files and buckets allowing browsing, creating, and deleting files and buckets.

Freeware Amazon S3 client by CloudBerry Lab comes with a full support for CloudFront (Amazon Content Delivery Network (CDN)). It includes a set of tools to manage CloudFront HTTP and Streaming Distributions, Public and Private content and more.
displayName: CloudBerry Explorer for Amazon S3 Freeware
summary: CloudBerry Explorer for Amazon S3 is a freeware Amazon S3 and Amazon Glacier client designed to run in Windows environment.
author: CloudBerry Lab
